title: Ep. 262: Marin Katusa Unplugged
itunes:title: Marin Katusa Unplugged
description:
Resource expert and fund manager, Marin Katusa, talks about his new book "The Colder War." He explains how Russia - not the U.S. - is becoming the most powerful force in the energy market. 
Marin also talks about the junior mining market and the massive opportunities that lie ahead for speculative investors.
